verses.roman:
dakṣiṇa yāite yaiche śakti prakāśilā
sei-mata paścima deśa, preme bhāsāilā

synonyms: dakṣiṇa yāite—while touring in the southern part of India; yaiche—as; śakti prakāśilā—manifested His spiritual energy; sei-mata—in that way; paścima deśa—the western part of India; preme bhāsāilā—inundated with love of Kṛṣṇa.
translation: Just as the Lord inundated South India on His tour there, He also inundated the western part of the country with love of Godhead.

purport.content: According to some opinions, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu visited Kurukṣetra while going to Prayāga from Vṛndāvana. There is a temple of Bhadra-kālī in Kurukṣetra, and near that temple there is a temple containing the Deity of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
